channel.title: Change amount in shops? & Bank Pin [Project Insanity]
channel.description:
I have a pk shop, and I need to change the amount of points you buy the items at, because they're all set really low.
Project Insanity, DreamScape source and client.
ALSO. I don't want this bank pin on here, so can I just delete the whole BANKPIN.JAVA? Thanks!

item.title: Change amount in shops? & Bank Pin [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @EatMyWhiteStuff EatMyWhiteStuff
item.description:
@EatMyWhiteStuff wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:2, topic:447089”]Amount of points the items worth is in shopassistant.java the format is,

case itemid: return price;

And it requires more than just deleting bankpin.java you may want to find the tutorial you used. But bank pins are useful.[/quote]

Thanks very much.
And yeah, I fixed up the bank pin and how it goes, so I’m keeping it now.

Can you help me here again? http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,550036.0.html
It’s really close to being solved.

Read full topic

Amount of points the items worth is in shopassistant.java the format is,

case itemid: return price;

And it requires more than just deleting bankpin.java you may want to find the tutorial you used. But bank pins are useful.
